Liége

Liége is the Wafelijzer theme used on the Belgian Man Records website.

You can find the theme files in the build folder.

Development

You can use Liége as a template for building your own Wafelijzer theme.

Add files to the css/, js/, or stylus/ directories, then run npm install and grunt to combine and compress all the files together.

You’ll find your compressed files in build/: css.min.css and js.min.js.

Stylus

Liége uses Stylus for CSS templating. Stylus files in stylus/ are compiled to css/stylus.css, then combined and compressed with the rest of your CSS files.
